project.description: for each children 1. it's downloading the size report of the latest tag and the size report of one tag before the latest one. 2. compare the two reports and check the size differences between them.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
change=`echo $GERRIT_REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` ps=`echo $GERRIT_REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f5` artifactory_host=artifactory needToSendEmail="False" artifactory_url=https://$artifactory_host/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB failedToCurlOnceAtLeast="False" User="$artifactory_user:$artifactory_password" NEWLINE=$'\n' # get one tag before ${NEWTAG} to compare two newest size_report csv OLDTAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 ${NEWTAG}^ --first-parent origin/$BUILD_BRANCH | head -n1) echo "OLD TAG == $OLDTAG"
echo "In branch ${BUILD_BRANCH} between tags ${OLDTAG} and ${NEWTAG} the img size is different in the following models:" > emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt #get all childs names from the spesific TAG childs=$(cat boards2compile.yml | sed s/.*AUTOPRD=// | cut -d" " -f1 | cut -d"&" -f1) allChilds=($childs) allChildsLength=${#allChilds[@]} for i in `seq 2 $(($allChildsLength-1))` do echo "*****************************************************${allChilds[i]}********************************************************************" #get the OLDER CSV REPORT (NEWTAG -1) curl -k -u ${User} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${BUILD_BRANCH}/${OLDTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv" || curlHasFailed="True" # if curl failed to download the report (not running the comparison)
if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then failedToCurlOnceAtLeast="True" echo "Failed to download sizeReport from Artifactory to ${allChilds[i]}" >> size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt curlHasFailed="False" else # run comparison between the old csv to the new csv RetunedValue=0 sh scripts/mtds_size.sh size_diff ${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv ${NEWTAG}_size_report.csv || RetunedValue=$? #return 0 if the script succeseded else if failed if [[ $RetunedValue == "0" ]] then echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test passed" elif [[ $RetunedValue == "1" ]] then needToSendEmail="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed, You can see full report here ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt" >> emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt else needToSendEmail_reduced_size="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} full report: ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt" >> emailContent_reduced_size.txt fi if [[ -e build/size_diff_report_${NEWTAG}.txt ]] then mv build/size_diff_report_${NEWTAG}.txt size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt #push the report to artifactory to each children #curl -ks -u ipp-size-check:ipp-size-check -X PUT "${artifactory_url}/${BUILD_BRANCH}/${NEWTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${NEWTAG}_size_report_result.txt" -T size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt fi fi done
echo "needToSendEmail=$needToSendEmail" > properties echo "OLDTAG=$OLDTAG" >> properties # If both conditions are true so i am failing the build because all moudules are failed to download size_report from artifactory if [[ "$failedToCurlOnceAtLeast" == "True" && "$needToSendEmail" == "False" ]] then echo "*************Not found in artifactory ${OLDTAG}******************" #put me and jontan reviewrs ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit "gerrit set-reviewers -a Ben.Magriso@audiocodes.com -a Jonatan.Reberger@audiocodes.com ${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION}" fi #if at least one Models Are Failed put size-1 if [[ "$needToSendEmail" == "True" ]] then echo "size=-1" #ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --label Size=-1 ${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION} #message="size_diff Test has failed on model ${AUTOPRD}. You can see the output here: ${BUILD_URL}artifact/build${NEWLINE}Please make sure this increased size can not be avoided.${NEWLINE}To approve this change please contact Arik Kabessa." #ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --message "'${message}'" $change,$ps else #all True put size +1 echo "Size=+1" #ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --label Size=+1 ${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION} fi

com.chikli.hudson.plugin.naginator.Nagin.regexpForRerun: .*(ClosedChannel|no workspace from node|Workspace is not accessible|node is offline|Error fetching remote|JNLP4-connect connection|Error cloning remote repo 'origin').*
